Key Match Events: South Africa defeated Bangladesh by 104 runs in Match 22 of the T20 World Cup 2022 Super 12 Stage, at the SCG in Sydney.
Anrich Nortje took a four-wicket haul, helping South Africa bowl out Bangladesh for 101 in 16.3 overs.
Rilee Rossouw scored a century, making 109 runs off 56 balls, including seven fours and eight sixes.
Quinton de Kock hammered 63 runs off 38 balls.
Shakib Al Hasan took two wickets for Bangladesh.
